Uses of Package
model.gizmos

  • Packages that use model.gizmos 
    Package Description
    model
    The model package for the Gizmoball application The model holds the current state of the game and is responsible for updating its state during play
    model.gizmos
    The model.gizmos package for the GizmoBall Application This package contains all of the gizmos that are present within the game.
    view
    The view package for the GizmoBall Application This package contains the view portion of the application
  • Classes in model.gizmos used by model 
    Class and Description
    IGizmo
    The gizmo interface The gizmo interface provides public access to useful methods for the gizmos
  • Classes in model.gizmos used by model.gizmos 
    Class and Description
    Flipper
    An abstract class for the flippers
    Gizmo
    A gizmo This abstract class provided the base for all of the gizmo's that the model has.
    Gizmo.Orientation
    Used to represent the orientation of the gizmo
    Gizmo.TriggerType
    Provides the type of trigger type
    Gizmo.Type
    Used to represent the type of gizmo
    IGizmo
    The gizmo interface The gizmo interface provides public access to useful methods for the gizmos
  • Classes in model.gizmos used by view 
    Class and Description
    IGizmo
    The gizmo interface The gizmo interface provides public access to useful methods for the gizmos
